  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c: change to new bump name.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTypes.c: add new strand/frame functions for setting/printing. Parse bump string better. Add frame stuff to inherited styles.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapStyle.c: Add functions to check styles are drawable and make them drawable. Fix bump modes. Add gobject frame/strand stuff.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapStyle_I.h: add new frame/strand state.
  • src/zmapServer/: zmapServer.c, zmapServer.h: add new style/feature set calls to interface.

  • src/zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer_P.h: bump up server version. Add new child tag.
  • src/zmapServer/: das/dasServer.c, file/fileServer.c: add new feature set calls.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: don't merge navigator style names into main style list, all predefined now.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: add rationalised bump names.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColOrder.c: use new frame calls.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w4/command.c: fix uninitialised variable (status) error.
  • w6/smap.c: fix small bug in smapdump for when root has no parent.
  • w3/gifacemain.c, w3/tacemain.c, w3/taqlmain.c, w3/xacemain.c, wsocket/serverace.c: fix locale bug, we only handle straight C
  • w3rdparty/libpfetch/: Makefile, libcurlobject.c, libcurlobject.h, libcurlobject_I.h, libpfetch-cmarshal.c, libpfetch-cmarshal.h, libpfetch-cmarshal.list, libpfetch-utils.c, libpfetch.c, libpfetch.h, libpfetch_I.h, libpfetch_P.h: initial version of pfetch package.
  • w3rdparty/libpfetch/.deps/: libcurlobject_a-libcurlobject.Po, libpfetch_a-libpfetch-cmarshal.Po, libpfetch_a-libpfetch-utils.Po, libpfetch_a-libpfetch.Po: compile dependencies
  • w3rdparty/libpfetch/: libpfetch-cmarshal.c, libpfetch-cmarshal.h: remove libpfetch-cmarshal.c libpfetch-cmarshal.h, they are generated by the make.
  • w3rdparty/libpfetch/: Makefile, README: first versions.
  • w4/: commandmenu.c, command.c: add neighbours command to mirror find neighbours in keyset window.
  • w3rdparty/libpfetch/Makefile: fix up to use acedb DEFs files to build on different machines.
  • w4/command.c: remove duplicate objects found message.
  • wh/command.h: add a find neighbours command.
  • wmake/DARWIN_4_DEF: fix up ar command, compiler commands.
  • wmake/DARWIN_UNIVERSAL_DEF: fix up universal binary options, ar options.
  • wmake/: LINUX_4_DEF, LINUX_64_DEF: fix up pkgconfig options, ar options.
  • wmake/makefile: remove unsupported code from all target, rationalise defines so we only build main progs.
  • wmake/truemake: fix ar options, fix pfetch defines.
  • w6/smap_.h: add debug flag to allow per smap setting from debugger.
  • w6/smap.c: add error handling to smapaddnode(), used to silently fail.
  • wmake/makefile: provide standard build for acedb build system.
  • wnq/aceversion.c: update to 47
